lines.text: This is a new country we're building up. There's no room in for weaklings - men or women!
Say, that boy's so smart he'd dry snow and sell it as sugar.
When I want to know anything from you, I'll tell ya, you long-legged son-of-a -...

[Trampas stops talking abruptly as the Virginian's pistol is pressed against his abdomen]
If you want to call me that, smile!
With a gun against my belly, I - I always smile!
You're liable to talk yourself into a heap of trouble, my friend.
Since when was I your friend, Trampas?
I have several little boys just your age.
Do book learnin' do a cowhand any good?
The only thing I don't like about this stealin' business is the hard work.
Well, I heard the only way a man can get shot in the back is runnin' away.
This world isn't big enough for the both of us!
